Package org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.recipe

Class RecipeProviderBase

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.data.recipes.RecipeProvider
org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.recipe.RecipeProviderBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.data.DataProvider, RecipeExtension
public abstract class RecipeProviderBase extends net.minecraft.data.recipes.RecipeProvider implements RecipeExtension
Provider for all kinds of recipes. By itself does not add support for any recipes. However you can add extensions by implementing the interface. All extensions must implement RecipeExtension. As this class implements RecipeExtension as well, you don't need to implement any methods when adding an extension. For a list of available extensions, see the subclasses of RecipeExtension.
